column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Come for the art
column2: stay for the experience. The Art Institute is an outstanding way to spend your time with others or even alone. There's such a great variety of art styles being presented through different time periods. Everybody will find something that appeases their interests. The regular price tickets may be on the expensive side
column3: but is pretty worth it considering how much there is to see and how much of a day can be spent here. Be on the look out for certain days that offer free deals. I was able to get free tickets through a special offer from my university. Overall
column4: you won't be sorry visiting the museum and will leave with lasting memories.
